ygData.subject: Windows XP tip

Hi guys,

Just to help save people time. If your having problems setting th=
e
permissions of the password file under Windows XP. Here's a quick fix.

F=
rom the Dos prompt type. Without the quotes.

"calc jmxremote.password"

Th=
is will display all the user permissions on that file. You might see
your u=
ser account something like this "machinename\user:F".

You want to change t=
he F to R. So type this.

"cacl jmxremote.password /P machinename\user:R"

=
Where machinename is your computer name, and user is your login name.

I co=
uldn't get Heritrix 1.12 to work under Windows XP Home edition
until I did =
this. At work, we use the Professional edition and it
allows you to control=
 security options from the file properties. But,
Home edition appears to be=
 lacking that feature.

Hope this saves someone time.

Later,
Mathew.
